definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding

sentences.english: Some people say it came from the Native American Indiantrivetribe known as the Choctaw.
sentences.chinese: 一些人说这是来自于美国当地土著人的乔克托语。

sentences.english: The visitor can ponder over the boomerangs used by aborigines at the time of Cook.
sentences.chinese: 来访者可以琢磨琢磨土著人在库克时期用的回飞镖。

sentences.english: Native Americans who lived near the Great Lakes often fished by torchlight.
sentences.chinese: 居住在“五大湖”附近的土著人经常使用火把捕鱼。

sentences.english: The , the indigenous people of Japan, traditionally wore facial tattoos.
sentences.chinese: 阿伊努人，土著人的日本，传统穿著纹面。
你这是在跟一个土著人打交道。

sentences.english: The natives instantaneously regard the bottle as a gift from their gods.
sentences.chinese: 当地土著人立即把瓶子看作是神灵的赐物。

sentences.english: Said one aborigine suddenly in very orthodox English.
sentences.chinese: 一名土著人突然用相当标准的英语说道。

sentences.english: The natives used to hammer the metal into arrowheads using heavy stones.
sentences.chinese: 土著人以前总是用沉重的石头把这种金属锤打成箭头。

sentences.english: The Ainus are the aboriginal people of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 阿依努人是日本土著人。

sentences.english: Wheelwright displays works of all Native American cultures.
sentences.chinese: 惠赖特博物馆展出所有美国土著人文化的作品。

sentences.english: Compliance It is desert area and no indigenous people lived here before.
sentences.chinese: 因为是沙漠地，以前没有土著人。

sentences.english: Large groups of Native Americans were forced to move away form their old hunting grounds.
sentences.chinese: 成批成批的美洲土著人被迫从他们原来的狩猎场迁走。

sentences.english: But the indigenous peoples did not run away.
sentences.chinese: 但是，土著人并没有如鸟兽散。

sentences.english: Still, the indigenous Aborigines and non-Europeans were not granted with equal rights.
sentences.chinese: 当地的土著人和非欧洲人不能享有平等的权利。

sentences.english: Incidentally, Japan has indigenous people, the Ainu.
sentences.chinese: 偶然的是，日本也有土著人，就是阿伊努人。

sentences.english: Australian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd apologises for the past mistreatment of Aborigines.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚总理陆克文对过去虐待土著人致歉。

definition: Maori, indigenous Polynesian people of New Zealand
